Package team1351.purepursuit.paths

Class LinearPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearPath
  • public class LinearPath
extends java.lang.Object
    Linear Path Object.

    Contains functions for generating a set of lines based on a set of Waypoints to create a path.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Owen Leather

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int steps
      Number of points generated.
      private Waypoint[] waypoints
      Array of Waypoints that the curve passes through.

    • Field Detail

      • steps

        private int steps
        Number of points generated. The more steps, the longer it takes to generate but the more accurate the path generation will be.

      • waypoints

        private Waypoint[] waypoints
        Array of Waypoints that the curve passes through.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LinearPath

        public LinearPath​(Waypoint[] waypoints,
                  int steps)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        waypoints - Array of Waypoints that are the endpoints of the lines.
        steps - Number of points generated. The more steps, the longer it takes to generate but the more accurate the path generation will be.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public TrajectoryPoint[] generate()
        Generates the path. For each set of Waypoints, generate a new segment of the path that passes through those waypoints. Add all of the segments together to get the final path, which can be generated based on any number of defining waypoints.
        Returns:
        Array of TrajectoryPoints that make up the LinearPath.

      • generateSegment

        private TrajectoryPoint[] generateSegment​(Waypoint waypoint0,
                                          Waypoint waypoint1,
                                          int steps,
                                          boolean firstSegment,
                                          boolean lastSegment)
        Generates a segment of the path. Each segment of the path is the part of the path between each set of two Waypoint. For the LinearPath, each segment is a set of TrajectoryPoints on a line between the two waypoints.
        Parameters:
        waypoint0 - First Waypoint to generate the segment.
        waypoint1 - Second Waypoint to generate the segment.
        steps - Amount of points in this segment.
        firstSegment - If the segment is the first segment in a path.
        Returns:
        An array of TrajectoryPoints that create a segment of the path.
